title: bronze player looking for team
body:
hey guys 

so im in bronze and i hate life, over the last year post placements i learnt that tbh i was a pretty average and made moves to improve my play across all areas. since then it safe to say i took advice and "got gud" however i still cant make it out of bronze due to trolls and feeders ect. just looking for a group of guys who are pretty serious about getting the hell outa elo hell and more importantly getting better at the game and having a bit of fun.

add Raijn bokun if you wanna have a few good salt free rankies

replies.body: Add me if you like.  Would be good to have some more friendly ranked matches
Hey im down, add me if you want to play :)
Add me, haven't played much ranked, but I've been around since S2 haven't bothered much with ranked cause I know how bad it can be. But if we can get a group together maybe it won't be so bad
